headline: Ottawa and New Delhi forge strategic energy alliance
summary: Investing.com -- Ottawa and New Delhi have formalized a significant energy partnership, marking a major recalibration of bilateral ties. Energy Ministers Timothy Hodgson and Hardeep Singh Puri issued a joint statement Tuesday from Goa, outlining plans for Canada to export crude oil and liquefied natural gas (LNG) in exchange for Indian refined petroleum products. The agreement followed the first high-level participation of Canada at India Energy Week, effectively launching the renewed talks. Bot
